page.title: 14RECREATION-CLAYBROOKE AREA
page.content: MY LEISURE TIME by Ian Holmes Since I moved to Claybrooke I enjoy a more social life.On Wednesday I go to Scouts for two hours. On Thursday I go to my Judo class in Lutterworth for an hour. On Saturday I will be in a Judo competition. I enjoy football most of all so on Friday I go to Lutterwoth Under 11's Football Club for training. On 17th May I was awarded the Under 11's Most Improved Player of 1984-5. MY LEISURE TIME by Trudy Goodband On Thursday when I got home from school I made a felt picture of summer before I got ready for my Trampoling class in Lutterworth. It lasts from 5.30 to 6.30pm. On arriving home I had my tea and then went to Guides in Ullesthorpe from 7.30 to 9.00pm.
